mapper.insert:

(#{jmXj2Tf.sid}, #{jmXj2Tf.cid}, #{jmXj2Tf.jbNo}, #{jmXj2Tf.rlt},#{jmXj2Tf.spcType},#{jmXj2Tf.spcChk},#{jmXj2Tf.opRem}, #{jmXj2Tf.salNo},#{jmXj2Tf.opDd},#{jmXj2Tf.prdSn},#{jmXj2Tf.dmdel},#{jmXj2Tf.delayB},#{jmXj2Tf.overE})
